snippet.title: Hero Online Trailer
snippet.description: Hero Online is a free MMORPG richly layered in martial arts combat and mystic Oriental legends, creating a unique fantasy world with stunning graphics and smooth gameplay.  Do you have what it takes to be a true hero?  Find out as you join the mighty clash between warring factions in this unforgettable game.
